name: Die Maus: Verrückte Olympiade
overview: Die Maus: Verrueckte Olympiade is a Sports game, developed by Neon Studios and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 2001. Quickly slip into the role of the mouse to take part in very unique tests: throw pancakes at the blue elephant, prove your cunning in the mouse house, fly high in a balloon, search for unexplored treasures in an old factory building... 2 game modes with 6 original disciplines Competition with 1-4 players 100% "The Mouse": extraordinary and peaceful Child-friendly: built-in help and funny review.
